short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explain the grammatical structure of selected sentences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Grammar Helper Extension is a powerful tool designed to assist users in understanding and analyzing the grammatical structure of sentences. This Chrome extension leverages the capabilities of OpenAI's language model to provide detailed grammatical explanations for selected text. Simply highlight a sentence, click the extension, and receive a comprehensive breakdown of its grammatical components.
